Table of Contents

Namespace Gasimo.CineBlend.Modules

Classes

CineAutoFrameModule

CineAutoFrameModule Script that automatically frames target actors.

CineImpulseShakeModule

Shakes this camera when an impulse is received.

CineLookAtModule

CineLookAtModule Script with smooth follow functionality.

CineRecomposeModule

Allows you to offset the position and rotation of the camera.

CineShakeModule

Adds realistic multi-frequency camera noise effects to the game.

CineTransformModule

CineTransformModule class holds camera transforms and can apply them. This is a default module which is auto-included on built-in VirtualCameras.
